channel.title: EPSILON - Where legends retire [317/474]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ot1no4l.png[/img]
Our plans: To gain more players! To add more content! To satisfy our players! And to have fun!
I see plenty of old school servers dying.. So I thought why not bring a (474) 2007 rsps in, with God Wars & more stuff than the 2006! We are thinking of improving this to the maximum level, we will be looking for good coders to to help out the dev team! Why join Epsilon? We are trying our best to make this one of the best 474 based [PIs] out there! To gain more players, to satisfy others & to add more content! You suggest we do! The experience rates are not to slow nor to fast! DECENT.. what I mean Is you can get some 99s after a day or couple hours of playing! You can compete against other Epsilon players, to be on top!
[URL=http://epsilonps.co.nr/][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/BILDER/7YIOxgN.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Epsilonv1test.jar][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/cMx9Mn1.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=EpsilonRsPs][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/g3gfTLf.png[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3319554757.png[/img] Hosting 24/7 Server: Epsilon server runs off a Windows box VPS(Not linux for other reasons. I'm very good with SSH). 3g Memory, Duel(No more power is needed, I've already done tests and a few benchmarks and Epsilon could easily handle 1,000 players if it got to that point).
Active Community and friendly staff. Info: An active community is a big concern for Epsilon. With strive to keep the community active not only in-game but also on the forums. All our staff is individually selected and all have a professional outlook on the future of Epsilon.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/4rubyf.png[/img]
Good Switching Slayer (Good for making money) Economic Server Daily Updates Plenty of teleports in the spells & commands! Great PvP and PvM combat God Wars Dungeon / no kc required Plenty of bosses Many Areas to explore Fishing trawler Decent skilling Sailing There Is also custom randoms & the RS randoms Sailing crash Dungeon collapses Desert hallucination Ranging guild Warrior guild Skillcape masters Full Dagganoth lair Pest control & rewards Close to perfect combat system Barrows [100%] Jad & fight pits Clue scrolls Normal prayers with (piety+) All spell books (Modern, Ancients, Lunar) Player following Player & Shop Trading All old school skills trainable! Flawless farming! NEW: PENGUIN MINIGAME (Drop clue scroll + give 1 penguin point each kill) Buy cool stuff from shop
There is so much more that you have too see for yourself!
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2njm4pl.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/epsilon%20new%20home.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/skills.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/BPdy1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/ta9sg.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/7thdO.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/0IkqZ.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/sSpYi.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/30t2se8.png[/img]
Staff team of Epsilon: Owner & founder: -Thor Adminstrators: -Injustice -Alex Moderators: -Voided -Open spot -Open spot -Open spot
CREDITS for useing this as a base: BIOHAZARD (mrClassic MCMXCV)
[/CENTER]

item.title: EPSILON - Where legends retire [317/474]
item.dc:creator: @boogey_wwe boogey wwe
item.description:
@boogey_wwe wrote:

[CENTER]

Our plans:
To gain more players!
To add more content!
To satisfy our players!
And to have fun!

I see plenty of old school servers dying…
So I thought why not bring a (474) 2007 rsps in, with God Wars & more stuff than the 2006!
We are thinking of improving this to the maximum level, we will be looking for good coders to to help out the dev team!
Why join Epsilon?
We are trying our best to make this one of the best 474 based [PIs] out there! To gain more players, to satisfy others & to add more content!
You suggest we do!
The experience rates are not to slow nor to fast! DECENT… what I mean Is you can get some 99s after a day or couple hours of playing! You can compete against other Epsilon players, to be on top!

[URL=http://epsilonps.co.nr/][/URL]

[URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Epsilonv1test.jar][/URL]

[URL=https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=EpsilonRsPs][/URL]


Hosting 24/7
Server:
Epsilon server runs off a Windows box VPS(Not linux for other reasons. I’m very good with SSH). 3g Memory, Duel(No more power is needed, I’ve already done tests and a few benchmarks and Epsilon could easily handle 1,000 players if it got to that point).

Active Community and friendly staff.
Info:
An active community is a big concern for Epsilon. With strive to keep the community active not only in-game but also on the forums.
All our staff is individually selected and all have a professional outlook on the future of Epsilon.

Good Switching
Slayer (Good for making money)
Economic Server
Daily Updates
Plenty of teleports in the spells & commands!
Great PvP and PvM combat
God Wars Dungeon / no kc required
Plenty of bosses
Many Areas to explore
Fishing trawler
Decent skilling
Sailing
There Is also custom randoms & the RS randoms
Sailing crash
Dungeon collapses
Desert hallucination
Ranging guild
Warrior guild
Skillcape masters
Full Dagganoth lair
Pest control & rewards
Close to perfect combat system
Barrows [100%]
Jad & fight pits
Clue scrolls
Normal prayers with (piety+)
All spell books (Modern, Ancients, Lunar)
Player following
Player & Shop Trading
All old school skills trainable!
Flawless farming!
NEW: PENGUIN MINIGAME (Drop clue scroll + give 1 penguin point each kill) Buy cool stuff from shop

There is so much more that you have too see for yourself!







Staff team of Epsilon:
Owner & founder:
-Thor
Adminstrators:
-Injustice
-Alex
Moderators:
-Voided
-Open spot
-Open spot
-Open spot

CREDITS for useing this as a base:

[/CENTER]
